1.name: DR.BELMEUR Amino Clear Foaming Cleanser
1.description:
Milky textured low-irritant cleansing foam formulated with amino acid gently washes off the fine dust and cares for dead skin cells. This low-pH formula provides your skin with a gentle yet effective cleansing effect.
Skin type:  Normal to Dry. Suitable for sensitive skin.
Fragrance: the refreshing herbal scent of rosemary, eucalyptus and bergamot.
Texture: milky texture which creates foam when mixed with water.

2.name: DR.BELMEUR Amino Clear Cleansing Water
2.description:
One-step, low-irritant, slightly acidic cleansing water with excellent cleansing power that mildly manages dead skin cells, removes makeup and leaves refreshed, moisturizing sensation.
Skin type:  Normal to Dry. Suitable for sensitive skin.
Fragrance: no scent.  
Texture: non-sticky micellar water.

3.name: DR.BELMEUR Amino Clear Foaming Cleanser for Acne-Prone Skin
3.description:
A deep foaming cleanser for acne-prone skin, formulated with mild cleansing complex and Salicylic acid that minimizes irritation and thoroughly removes impurities and exfoliate dead skin cells. Combination of amino acid and coconut oil provides your skin with an effective yet gentle cleansing effect. Thanks to the use of Panthenol and Glycerin this non-irritating cleanser will leave your skin moisturized and soothed.
Skin type:  Oily and combination.  Suitable for sensitive skin.
Fragrance: refreshing citrus herbal scent of ginger, rosemary, bergamot and eucalyptus.  
Texture: cream, creates foam when mixed with water.

4.name: DR.BELMEUR Amino Clear Bubble Foaming Cleanser for Acne Prone Skin
4.description:
A deep foaming cleanser with rich bubbles for acne-prone skin, formulated with mild cleansing complex and Salicylic acid that minimizes irritation and removes impurities on the skin. The salicylic acid helps to exfoliate the dead skin cells and purify the pores effectively.
Skin type: Oily and combination. Suitable for sensitive skin.
Fragrance: refreshing citrus herbal scent of tea tree oil, rosemary, bergamot and eucalyptus.  
Texture: creamy texture which creates foam when mixed with water

5.name: DR.BELMEUR Amino Clear Peeling Pad
5.description:
A low-irritant peeling toner formula infused with amino acid helps to remove excess oil, dead skin cells and impurities to create a smoother complexion. The peeling toner and 60 exfoliating pads are meant for daily use (if you have sensitive skin, it is recommended to use the peeling toner 2-3 times a week). The product combines the exfoliating effect with skincare function, as the formula covers the toner step.
Skin type:  All skin types. Suitable for sensitive skin.
Fragrance: refreshing citrus herbal scent of rosemary, bergamot and eucalyptus.  
Pads texture: double-sided pad with gauze side for intense care of dull skin with excess dead skin cells (not suitable for sensitive skin) and embossed side gentle peeling effect.  
Peeling water: transparent, watery texture which is being absorbed by the pads. 
Dermatologically tested.

6.name: RICE WATER BRIGHT Rice Bran All-in-One Cleanser
6.description: Exfoliator + Facial Cleanser + Makeup Remover in one. This all-in-one facial cleanser effectively removes makeup and dead skin cells, so there's no need to double cleanse.

7.name: HERB DAY Lip & Eye Makeup Remover Pads
7.description: Formulated with plant extracts, these makeup remover tissues cleanse lip and eye makeup gently.Contains 30 wipes.

8.name: DR.BELMEUR Daily Repair Exfoliating Pads
8.description: The gentle exfoliating pad instantly improves flaky skin even if it’s sensitive (clean, convenient packaging)Clear and gentle skin solution for flaky skin. Skin-sync RXTM containing balsamic vinegar rich in plant-derived fermented ingredient, eliminates flaky skin to maintain a smoother skin texture. *Formulated without 8 additives (parabens, tar colorant, artificial fragrance, mineral oil, benzophenone-3, propylene glycol, talc, benzoic acid) or artificial fragrance Includes 24 padsAbout Dr.Belmeur Daily Repair: A premium derma-cosmetic skincare line that uses plant-based ingredients that have similar components to our skin. Dermatologically tested, this line provides gentle skincare and barrier-enhancing solution to common skin problems. The Daily Repair offers a custom-made formula that helps improve sensitive skin.

9.name: ALL CLEAR Cleansing Water Wipes
9.description:
Cleansing water wipes can even remove lip and eye makeup in just one stroke!No rinsing is required with cleansing foam or lip and eye makeup remover!
Cleansing water wipes (formulated with natural cleansing ingredients) remove even the heaviest makeup without a trace. They also contain low molecular hyaluronic acid, which leaves skin feeling hydrated.

10.name: HERB DAY Cleansing Foam Peach
10.description: This foaming cleanser eliminates impurities and gently softens skin. Enriched with peach extract rich in vitamins, its revitalizes and tones flaky and rough skins.

11.name: SMART PEELING Mild Papaya
11.description: An exfoliator with natural papaya enzymes and hyaluronic acid that smoothes and enriches skin with moisture.

170 ML / 5.74 FL. OZ.

120 ML / 4.0 FL. OZ.

20.description: This makeup remover eliminates even the most stubborn makeup residue and leaves skin soft to the touch. Its powerful, moisturizing formula made of rice water (contains Vitamin A, B, E and ceramide that hydrates the skin even after cleansing) and its milky texture are suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

21.name: JEJU VOLCANIC LAVA Peel Off Nose Pack
21.description: Peel-off clay mask that dissolves excess oil and removes impurities from deep within the pores, giving clean appearance of nose. About Jeju Volcanic Lava : This purifying pore line contains volcanic ash from Jeju Island, a rare natural ingredient that effectively absorbs sebum and cleanses the pores, and an urban defense complex to protect skin from pollution and make it clean and clear.

28.description: Get pure, fresh skin with this cleansing oil. Formulated with rice water (contains Vitamin A, B, E and ceramide that hydrates the skin even after cleansing) and enriched with jojoba oil, it dissolves impurities found on your skin's surface while hydrating the epidermis.

30.name: RICE WATER BRIGHT Cleansing Cream
30.description: This cleansing cream dissolves make-up and removes impurities as it brightens your skin tone. Formulated with rice water, which contains Vitamin A, B, E and ceramide that hydrates the skin even after cleansing.

31.name: RICE WATER BRIGHT Cleansing Tissue

Formulated with natural Botanical Oils infused with Lavender Flower inspired by the Marseille soap recipe, this mild cleansing oil works gently and removes makeup and impurities from skin pron to irritation, leaving skin feeling comfortable.  Formula without eight additives: paraben, tar colorant, mineral oil, taic, silicone, paraffin, polyacrylamide, benzophenone-3.

38.description: Foaming cleanser with brightening rice bran removes dead skin cells. Formulated with Rice Bran that thoroughly removes dead skin cells, this moisturizing foaming cleanser helps restore bright skin complexion and leaves skin feeling soft and smooth.

39.name: ALL CLEAR Cleansing Water
39.description: The cleansing water thoroughly removes even the heaviest makeup.

45.name: DR.BELMEUR Daily Repair Cleansing Water
45.description: Pure, mild moisturizing cleansing water that both cleanses and protects skin. Formulated with the daily low-irritant moisturizing solution Skin-sync Rx™ which its 3 key ingredients help form a moisture layer to calm dry skin : phytoshpingosine (protects and strengthens skin barrier), moroheiya (retains moisture by restoring moisture in skin’s barrier) and birch tree sap (calms redness & soothes skin).*Formulated without 8 additives (parabens, synthetic pigments, mineral oil, benzophenone-3, animal-derived ingredients, propylene glycol, talc, benzoic acid) or artificial fragranceAbout Dr.Belmeur Daily Repair: A premium derma-cosmetic skincare line that uses plant-based ingredients that have similar components to our skin.
